mapper.select: SELECT SCH_TITLE AS sch_title, SCH_STARTDATE AS sch_startdate, SCH_ENDDATE AS sch_enddate, SCH_COLOR AS sch_color FROM SCHEDULE
SELECT s.EMPNO, e.NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_TITLE, SCH_STARTDATE, SCH_ENDDATE, SCH_COLOR FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON s.EMPNO = e.EMPNO WHERE EMPNO = #{empno} AND s.USE_YN ='Y'
SELECT s.EMPNO, e.NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_TITLE, SCH_STARTDATE, SCH_ENDDATE, SCH_COLOR FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON s.EMPNO = e.EMPNO WHERE DEPTNO = #{deptno} s.USE_YN ='Y'
SELECT s.EMPNO, e.NAME, SCH_ID, SCH_TITLE, SCH_STARTDATE, SCH_ENDDATE, SCH_COLOR FROM SCHEDULE s JOIN EMPLOYEES e ON s.EMPNO = e.EMPNO WHERE s.USE_YN ='Y'
